name: RICHARD - Part One
description:
RICHARD - Part One ia a (frenzy) little platform-game: challenge the Ugly Devils of your rival's castle to prove your incomparable dandy skills!

Realized in true 16-bit Pixel Art, by the creators of UNDEAD NERDS, RICHARD - Part One is an humble tribute to the old Japanese action-games from the 80's (like Mario Bros. arcade version).


FEATURES:

  • 16 levels full of monsters!
  • Part one of a new exciting three-part saga!
  • Original story!
  • Voice-performed Sound-Track!
